com.st.st25sdk

Interface MultiAreaInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    M24SR02KTag, M24SR04KTag, M24SR16KTag, M24SR64KTag, M24SRTag, M24SRTAHighDensityTag, ST25DV02KWTag, ST25DVTag, ST25TA16KTag, ST25TA64KTag, ST25TV64KTag, ST25TVTag, STType4MultiAreaTag, STType5MultiAreaTag

    public interface MultiAreaInterface
    Interface specific to Tags supporting several memory areas

      • setReadWriteProtection

        void setReadWriteProtection(int area,
                            TagHelper.ReadWriteProtection protection,
                            byte[] password)
                     throws STException
        Sets the access rights for the specified area. The password is used to authorize the modification of the settings of this Area.
        Parameters:

        protection -
        password - Configuration password
